page.title: 07NOTABLE EVENTS
page.content: On Sunday the 28th April 1985 a cycle race, the first of its kind in Britain, called the League International was held in Albrighton, which is 7 miles from Wolverhampton. It was for ages 45 to 60. On Wednesday 2nd of May 1984 the Methodist Church held their Centenary Concert at St Mary's Church.St Mary's Church also held their annual flower and music festival from the 30th June 4th July 85.A variety of concerts were given including one by the local schools.These were very well attended by locals and visitors.At Donington Church they have been celebrating their 900th birthday.They have been celebrating with pageants,barbecues and picnics.Also they attended the village fayre float competition, and won first prize with a float to show 900 years of history.
